thread.title: Rīgu Eiropā arī nākamgad turpinās reklamēt kā piemērotu filmēšanas galamērķi
thread.title_full: Rīgu Eiropā arī nākamgad turpinās reklamēt kā piemērotu filmēšanas galamērķi

posts.title: Rīgu Eiropā arī nākamgad turpinās reklamēt kā piemērotu filmēšanas galamērķi
posts.text:
Rīgu Eiropā arī nākamgad turpinās reklamēt kā piemērotu filmēšanas galamērķi 07.11.2017 06:08 Autors: Iveta BulāneAvots: Rīgas dome 
Lai veicinātu ārvalstu filmu uzņemšanu Latvijas galvaspilsētā, Rīgas pašvaldība arī 2018.gadā plāno piešķirt līdzfinansējumu dalībai Eiropas filmu tirgū Berlīnē. 
“Piedaloties industrijas nozīmīgā profesionālajā pasākumā, tiks stiprināta Rīgas un Latvijas starptautiskā atpazīstamība un reputācija kā filmēšanas galamērķim. Tas Rīgai ļaus piesaistīt jaunas investīcijas un popularizēt arī mūsu pilsētu kā tūrisma galamērķi,” uzsver Rīgas domes Pilsētas attīstības komitejas priekšsēdētājs Maksims Tolstojs. 
Projekta gaitā Rīgas pašvaldība sadarbībā ar Nacionālo kino centru un Latvijas Kinoproducentu asociāciju iekārtos kopīgu stendu Eiropas filmu tirgū Berlīnē 2018.gada februārī. 
Projekta kopējais budžets ir 19 470 eiro, no tā Rīgas pašvaldības līdzfinansējums paredzēts 5518 eiro un priekšfinansējums - 1952 eiro. 
Priekšfinansējuma un līdzfinansējuma piešķiršanu pirmdien, 6.novembrī, atbalstīja Rīgas domes Pilsētas attīstības komiteja. Galīgais lēmums būs jāpieņem Finanšu un administrācijas lietu komitejai. Par rakstu pārpublicēšanas noteikumiem lūdzam kontaktēties ar Travelnews.lv redakciju.

posts.title: Reasons To Hire Bail Bondsman LA Habra Today
posts.text:
By Anna Morgan 

When the police make an arrest, they ensure the defendant remains in jail until when they get sentenced or when they place a surety. Every crime committed carries a price. The law allows a person to request bail. When they make the payments, they get released. The majority of people lack the cash, and they need help. In such cases, the defendant needs to call the bail bondsman La Habra to help them.

After the police arrest a person suspected of committing a crime, they always move to the court and prosecute. The judges might use this to ask the defendant to place some bond so that they regain freedom. Raising the cash is not easy and the family might struggle. However, you can contact the bondman to come and place the surety.

The guarantors have licenses to operate and help the clients regain freedom. They do this by placing the surety on the client behalf. If it is set at two million dollars, the amount is too high and for some people, they have a hard time raising the amount that day. However, the agents come with the resources.

Today, every person will have a reason to engage these service providers. When you hire, there is a guarantee that they process it on your behalf. They know how the justice system operates. They ensure you win the legal battles. They have been in this field for long and know the legal procedures to follow. With this, only stay in jail for some minutes as they take charge of the process.

The amount asked varies depending on the crime committed. If asked to place a surety and you do not have money, you will be forced to sell some of your items to raise the cash. In some cases, you will sell the property at a loss. To avoid this, you can ask the agent to come and use their resources to pay the bail. Here, you save money because you will only pay a small commission.

In most cases, people engage these experts because they want to come out of jail within a short time. Since this is the dream of every individual, get these service providers. They are reliable and will be there on time to start processing the security. They act with speed to ensure that the client does not spend another hour in jail. They also exercise confidentiality.

For the process to end, a lot of paperwork and procedures are needed. When arrested, it becomes hard to know the methods used by the courts. It is thus vital that you have someone who understands the procedures and people to contact. When you get these agents to work, you will not have stress as everything goes on fast and smoothly.

In La Habra, you find many people arrested after committing crimes. These defendants are allowed by the law to place some surety, go home and come for the hearing date. Many individuals do not know how the justice system works and need help. The bondsmen will not only have the surety but also help individuals navigate the legal hurdles.

Popular Nollywood actress, Fathia Balogun, now Fathia Williams, shook the internet when the actress dropped her ex-spouse' name.  
The two who are top actors in the industry went their separate ways a while back. The mother of two have shared that her biggest down in life was when her marriage crashed.

In an exclusive interview with Broadway TV, Fathia stated that whatever happened has happened and the two actors have decided to remain in each other's lives one way or the other.

She said; "I was just not lucky... maybe some other time I will be lucky. We are not officially divorced since the case is still in court... We are friends, since I have two kids for him...

"I don't know if I will remarry, I want to keep that aside (for now)."

posts.author: Flowalk
posts.title: To avoid Nigeria’s disunity, avert rigging in Anambra, APGA Forum urges Buhari Continue here
posts.text:
The National Coordinator APGA Media Warriors Forum, Evang Chinedu Obigwe, has called on President Muhammadu Buhari to use his good office to ward off any electoral malpractice in the forthcoming Anambra gubernatorial election, noting that Nigeria’s’ unity would be questionable should the suspected APC syndicates alleged to have printed sensitive INEC materials succeed in rigging election.
President Buhari “I call on President Muhammadu Buhari to use his good office to nip this evil plot in the bud because failure to do so, his much cherished Nigeria unity will be destroyed”, he said.
Obigwe made the call in a statement issued to newsmen on Tuesday morning.
The National Coordinator APGA Media Warriors Forum equally alleged that the arrest of some suspected APC syndicates with printed INEC sensitive materials at Grace royal hotel Okpuno Awka was a glaring proof that Anambra APC has concluded their evil plot to rig the election.
His statement reads:
“I call on President Muhammadu Buhari to use his good office to nip this evil plot in the bud because failure to do so his much cherished Nigeria unity will be destroyed.
“APGA is like a religion in Anambra State, thus the reason why the people of the State are satisfied with Governor Willie Obiano’s good work in the State perhaps again the reason why they are supporting his merited second term re-election bid.
“The frequent visits of El- rufai, Rochas Okorocha and Orji Uzor Kalu, to Anambra state I believe have something to do with this rigging plot to favor Tony Nwoye.
“The people of Anambra State will ensure that no stone will be left unturned in checkmating and vehemently resisting APC rigging plot.
“This election will determine if Nigeria will remain one because no reasonable human being will like to be in a Country where the people’s democratic rights are trampled upon.
“I urge the people of the State to troop out en-mass to vote for Governor Obiano. Wait and ensure that they count your vote in order to resist rigging of any sort.”
Obigwe finally lampooned Tony Nwoye for his alleged plan to use Federal might to subvert the democratic will of the Ndi Anambra.
“But I have nothing to worry because Anambra electorates will shame him and his fellow riggers by ensuring that the right thing is done on November 18th”, he finally said.
The post To avoid Nigeria’s disunity, avert rigging in Anambra, APGA Forum urges Buhari appeared first on Vanguard News .

posts.title: В Москве экстренно эвакуируют спорткомплекс "Олимпийский" из-за сообщения о бомбе
posts.text:
В Москве эвакуируют спорткомплекс "Олимпийский" 
Полиция в Москве проверяет сообщение об угрозе взрыва в спорткомплексе “ Олимпийский ” . 
Как сообщает ТАСС со ссылкой на источник в экстренных службах, по соображениям безопасности из спорткомплекса эвакуируют людей. Около 11:00 вторника поступило анонимное сообщение об угрозе взрыва в здании на Олимпийском проспекте, дом №16. 
Ранее сегодня стало известно, что в жилом доме на Палехской улице ищут бомбу. 
Происшествия, новости преступного мира, громкие расследования и эксклюзивные подробности на криминальном канале в Telegram. "Олимпийский" проверяют из-за сообщения о "минировании" 
“ Олимпийский ” в центре Москвы после анонимного звонка о “ минировании ” , сообщил РИА Новости источник в экстренных службах. 
Волна телефонного терроризма началась в России 11 сентября, ни в одном случае угроза взрывов не подтвердилась. Ранее директор ФСБ России Александр Бортников сообщил, что ложными звонками о минировании занимаются четыре россиянина из-за рубежа, у которых есть пособники на территории РФ. По данным Бортникова, ущерб от их действий уже превысил 300 миллионов рублей.

thread.title: Los comerciantes de Ponferrada, divididos por el plan de peatonalización del centro
thread.title_full: Los comerciantes de Ponferrada, divididos por el plan de peatonalización del centro

posts.author: Elisabet Alba
posts.title: Los comerciantes de Ponferrada, divididos por el plan de peatonalización del centro
posts.text:
Los comerciantes de Ponferrada, divididos por el plan de peatonalización del centro Elisabet Alba - 7 de noviembre de 2017 
Un grupo de ellos, junto a propietarios de locales, hosteleros y vecinos, se han sentido minusvalorados en el planteamiento del proyecto y por eso recogen firmas en contra de las obras. Ya llevan más de 1.000 facebook Imagen de la calle La Paz, una de las más céntricas de la ciudad de Ponferrada, y peatonal. / QUINITO Los comerciantes y vecinos de Ponferrada están más divididos que nunca por el Plan de Dinamización del centro de la ciudad. Hace semanas, la alcaldesa de la capital del Bierzo, Gloria Fernández Merayo, presentaba el proyecto de reordenación del tráfico que apuesta por dar más espacio a peatones y ciclistas. Las calles Camino de Santiago y Gómez Núñez podrían convertirse el próximo 2018 en las arterias de entrada y salida de la zona centro, con un sólo carril de sentido único cada una, y sin plazas de aparcamiento.
Durante la presentación, Merayo aseguró contar con el beneplácito de los comerciantes, algo que días después subrayaron también representantes de la asociación Templarium. Éstos, como altavoz de los comerciantes de la zona centro, pidieron a la regidora una compensación por coincidir las obras con la época navideña: tres horas “extra” de aparcamiento gratuito en la zona azul ORA y en los aparcamientos subterráneos y actividades propias de esas fechas para animar las calles. 
Al mismo tiempo, propietarios de locales, comerciantes, hosteleros y vecinos se han sentido minusvalorados en el planteamiento del proyecto. “No se nos ha preguntado ni siquiera qué nos parecía el proyecto”, y aunque son conscientes de que quizá no consigan paralizar las obras con sus iniciativas, anuncian haber recogido ya “más de 1.000 firmas”, que entregarán en el Registro del Ayuntamiento este miércoles a las nueve y media de la mañana “para que sepan que no estamos de acuerdo”. Impime este artículo

A 30-year-old arrested human trafficker, Martha Edea, was recently nabbed by security operatives in Lagos. The suspect was seen with a creamy substance. She confessed that it was a specially prepared charm for her to get more men in her 'runs'. Her words;
“ I prepared two charms for the trip. One is a cream to make me to see work or get customers. Everybody dey use am . My friend recommended it to me. The other is ‘back to sender’. The teenagers, Francess Bamidele 19 and Elo Etim, 18 were recruited in Benin, Edo State.

While Francess didn’t inform her guardian about the trip, the second girl Elo notified her mother that the job is prostitution. Her mother assisted with some money and a phone number to call.

Her mother told her, 'go and make money with it (your body) where you are going’.

posts.author: Γιώργος Γουβιάς
posts.title: Στίβεν Χόκινγκ: Φοβάμαι πως η Τεχνητή Νοημοσύνη θα αντικαταστήσει τους ανθρώπους
posts.text:
Στίβεν Χόκινγκ: Φοβάμαι πως η Τεχνητή Νοημοσύνη θα αντικαταστήσει τους ανθρώπους 7 Νοεμβρίου 2017 - 10:50 tweet Professor Stephen Hawking receives the Honorary Freedom of the City of London, in recognition of his outstanding contribution to theoretical physics and cosmology, at Guildhall in London. (Photo by Dominic Lipinski/PA Images via Getty Images) 
Είναι ένας από τους εμβληματικότερους επιστήμονες της εποχής μας, και ως εκ τούτου, όταν λέει κάτι που έχει να κάνει με την τεχνολογική πρόοδο, είναι μάλλον καλύτερο να τον ακούει κανείς σοβαρά παρά να παίρνει τα λεγόμενά του αψήφιστα. 
Ο Χόκινγκ , όπως και ο Έλον Μασκ, ο Μπιλ Γκέιτς, και άλλες σημαντικές προσωπικότητες του κόσμου της επιστήμης και τεχνολογίας, έχει επανειλημμένα εκφράσει τον προβληματισμό του ότι η Τεχνητή Νοημοσύνη μπορεί να αποτελέσει κίνδυνο για την Ανθρωπότητα . Τον προβληματισμό του αυτόν επανέλαβε σε συνέντευξή του στο περιοδικό Wired, όπου εξέφρασε την πεποίθηση πως η Τεχνητή Νοημοσύνη (A.I.- Artificial Intelligence) θα φτάσει κάποια στιγμή σε ένα σημείο όπου θα είναι πρακτικά μια «νέα μορφή ζωής, η οποία θα έχει καλύτερες επιδόσεις από τον άνθρωπο» . 
«Φοβάμαι ότι η Α.Ι. Ίσως αντικαταστήσει τους ανθρώπους εξολοκλήρου. Αν οι άνθρωποι σχεδιάζουν ιούς υπολογιστών, κάποιος θα σχεδιάσει Τεχνητή Νοημοσύνη που βελτιώνεται και αντιγράφει τον εαυτό της. Αυτή θα είναι μια νέα μορφή ζωής, με καλύτερες επιδόσεις από τους ανθρώπους» είπε χαρακτηριστικά. 
Ο 75χρονος αστροφυσικός μίλησε επίσης για την πεποίθησή του ότι χρειαζόμαστε μια νέα «Διαστημική Εποχή» για να ενθαρρυνθούν οι νέοι να ασχοληθούν με την επιστήμη, και είπε πως θα υπάρξουν «σοβαρές επιπτώσεις» εάν δεν δείξουν ενδιαφέρον περισσότεροι άνθρωποι. 
Πρόσθεσε επίσης ότι θα έπρεπε η επιστημονική κοινότητα να δουλέψει επειγόντως πάνω σε ένα νέο διαστημικό πρόγραμμα, με σκοπό μακροπρόθεσμα τον αποικισμό πλανητών όπου μπορούν να ζήσουν άνθρωποι. 
«Πιστεύω πως έχουμε φτάσει στο σημείο όπου δεν υπάρχει επιστροφή. Η Γη μας γίνεται πολύ μικρή για εμάς, ο παγκόσμιος πληθυσμός αυξάνεται με ανησυχητικό ρυθμό και κινδυνεύουμε να αυτοκαταστραφούμε». 
Κατά τη διάρκεια της συνέντευξης, ο Χόκινγκ αποδοκίμασε επίσης την απόρριψη της κλιματικής αλλαγής από τον Αμερικανό πρόεδρο, Ντόναλντ Τραμπ. 
Υπενθυμίζεται πως ο διάσημος επιστήμονας έχει επανειλημμένα κρούσει τον κώδωνα του κινδύνου για το μέλλον της ανθρωπότητας στον πλανήτη Γη, τονίζοντας πως η μόνη λύση είναι η μετοίκηση στο Διάστημα, ενώ έχει αναφερθεί και στο θέμα μιας πιθανής επαφής με εξωγήινους, εκτιμώντας πως εάν φτάσουν στον πλανήτη μας είναι πολύ πιθανό το τελικό αποτέλεσμα να είναι ο αφανισμός του είδους μας.

thread.title: Irving takes charge, Celtics beat Hawks for 9th straight win
thread.title_full: Irving takes charge, Celtics beat Hawks for 9th straight win

posts.title: Irving takes charge, Celtics beat Hawks for 9th straight win
posts.text:
Irving takes charge, Celtics beat Hawks for 9th straight win 2017-11-07T03:33:05Z 2017-11-07T07:56:59Z (AP Photo/John Bazemore). Boston Celtics forward Al Horford (42) drives against Atlanta Hawks center Dewayne Dedmon (14) during the first half of an NBA basketball game Monday, Nov. 6, 2017, in Atlanta. (AP Photo/John Bazemore). Boston Celtics forward Jayson Tatum (0) has his shot blocked by Atlanta Hawks forward Taurean Prince (12) as Dewayne Dedmon looks on during the first half of an NBA basketball game Monday, Nov. 6, 2017, in Atlanta. (AP Photo/John Bazemore). Boston Celtics forward Jayson Tatum (0) scores during the first half of an NBA basketball game against the Atlanta Hawks Monday, Nov. 6, 2017, in Atlanta. (AP Photo/John Bazemore). Boston Celtics forward Jayson Tatum (0) drives against Atlanta Hawks forwards Taurean Prince (12) and Luke Babbitt (8) during the first half of an NBA basketball game Monday, Nov. 6, 2017, in Atlanta. (AP Photo/John Bazemore). Boston Celtics guard Marcus Smart (36) passes around Atlanta Hawks guard Isaiah Taylor (22) during the first half of an NBA basketball game Monday, Nov. 6, 2017, in Atlanta. 
By GEORGE HENRYAssociated Press 
ATLANTA (AP) - Kyrie Irving took charge in a fashion only he can. 
Dribbling and weaving through the lane and around the perimeter, Irving scored from all over and kept his teammates involved all night. 
"It's a beautiful game when it's played the right way," the four-time All-Star said. "It's not going to look good every possession, but you've got to be able to move onto the next play. I understand that better than most." 
Irving scored 35 points, Jayson Tatum added 21 and the Boston Celtics held off the Atlanta Hawks 110-107 Monday night for their ninth straight victory. 
Irving's 3 from the right wing put the Celtics up 104-103 - the game's 25th lead change - with 1:37 remaining, and Boston led the rest of the way. 
Dennis Schroder had 23 points for the rebuilding Hawks, who dropped to 2-9 a night after a surprising two-point win at Cleveland. 
"It would've been sweet to win two in a row against those kinds of teams," Schroder said. "But we ended up short." 
Boston improved to 9-2, best in the NBA, and has its longest winning streak in seven years. 
Al Horford had 15 points, 10 rebounds and nine assists in his best game against the Hawks. Horford spent his first nine seasons in Atlanta before leaving as a free agent ahead of last season and had totals of 20 points and 17 rebounds in three games against his former team. 
Irving had his first 30-point game as a Celtic on a night packed with highlights. He dribbled between his legs and behind his back before hitting a floater off the glass from the left baseline to put Boston up 46-44. He had two impressive assists late in the third with long, one-handed passes that led to 3s by Marcus Smart and Tatum, the latter giving Boston a 72-71 lead. 
Irving either scored or assisted on every basket of a 16-2 run in the third that put the Celtics up by seven. He finished with seven assists. 
"He's just very unique," Horford said. "He has a good sense of how teams are playing him." 
The Celtics started to pull away and took their biggest lead at 10 on Semi Ojeleye's 3 early in the fourth, but the Hawks came back to take a few brief leads in the final period. 
"To compete the way we did and give ourselves a chance to win, we got better tonight and we can learn from it," Atlanta coach Mike Budenhozler said. 
THAT'S A DRAG 
Boston coach Brad Stevens wasn't pleased with the ball movement or defense early in the third, storming the floor to call timeout after Atlanta's Luke Babbit hit a 3 to put the Hawks up 57-54. 
"You could just tell mentally and physically we were dragging a little bit," Irving said. "That's going to happen sometimes considering how hard we play, but we don't want to make that a habit for us. No excuse." 
RAINING DOWN 
Budenholzer joked before the game that he regretted having his assistants work with the 6-foot-10 Horford a couple of years ago to develop a strong presence beyond the perimeter. Horford, who went just 1 for 5 on 3s, entered the game shooting nearly 52 percent on 33 attempts from the arc. 
"I think there was just a real push from us and a credit to him that he could do it," Budenholzer said. "It's part of the way the game is, and his passing just opens up the court even more for him to drive and attack. He's such a good player, such a smart player." 
TIP-INS 
Celtics: Irving has scored more points - 245 - than any player in his first 11 games with Boston. ... With Marcus Morris getting the night off to rest his sore left knee, Aron Baynes started at center and finished with just two points and three rebounds in 15 minutes. 
Hawks: Malcolm Delaney returned after missing two games with a sprained right ankle and had 13 points. Marco Belinelli scored 19 despite a sore left Achilles. 
UP NEXT 
Celtics: Host the Lakers on Wednesday night. 
Hawks: Off until they visit Detroit on Friday night. 
___ 
For more NBA coverage: https://apnews.com/tag/NBAbasketball Copyright 2017 The Associated Press. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten or redistributed.

OldBatty said: ↑ Only one I had heard the full version was the second mouse getting the cheese. Willing to bet it is a modern ad on Click to expand... They're all recent add-ons.
"Blood is thicker than water" dates back to the 12th Century. The thing about 'covenant' was created in the early 1990s by a social revisionist.
"Curiosity killed the cat" is from Shakespeare's time (don't ask me which play!). The 'satisfaction' part was written by a yellow journalist in the early 1900s.
"Great minds think alike" came into use in the early 1600s. The 'fools' part dates back no further than the late 1800s or early 1900s.
"The early bird catches the worm" first appeared in print in 1670 (John Ray). The mouse/cheese part may be from from an early Disney or Tex Avery cartoon (opinions vary -- so many of them are lost, it's impossible to check), but the oldest definitive use was on Usenet in 1994.
etc. etc. etc.

posts.author: El Bierzo Digital
posts.title: El comandante del Centro de Operaciones Aéreas de la OTAN en Torrejón, pregonero de la Semana Santa de Ponferrada
posts.text:
El comandante del Centro de Operaciones Aéreas de la OTAN en Torrejón, pregonero de la Semana Santa El Bierzo Digital - 7 de noviembre de 2017 
Aunque nacido en Madrid, toda su familia paterna es del Bierzo y “él es y ejerce de berciano: su corazón y su alma siempre han sido del Bierzo”, explica el mayordomo de la Real Hermandad de Jesús Nazareno facebook 
La Real Hermandad de Jesús Nazareno de Ponferrada, y en su nombre el Mayordomo y la Junta de Gobierno, ha hecho público el nombre del pregonero de la Semana Santa de Ponferrada para el próximo año 2018 y será el teniente general Rubén C. García Servert, comandante del Centro de Operaciones Aéreas Combinadas de la OTAN en la Base Aérea de Torrejón. 
El mayordomo de la Real Hermandad, Marco Morala, ha mostrado su “especial satisfacción porque el Teniente General Servert haya tenido a bien aceptar el nombramiento de pregonero de la Semana Santa Ponferradina 2018”, ya que, aunque nacido en Madrid, toda su familia paterna es del Bierzo y “él es y ejerce de berciano: su corazón y su alma siempre han sido del Bierzo”. Impime este artículo

thread.title: Diezani Billions: EFCC Locates Another N950M
thread.title_full: Diezani Billions: EFCC Locates Another N950M

posts.author: Olu Famous (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Diezani Billions: EFCC Locates Another N950M
posts.text:
The Economic and Financial Crimes Commission, EFCC, on Monday traced N950m to the immediate past Kogi state governor, Idris Wada; and ex-Taraba State acting governor, Sani Danladi.

While N500m was traced to Wada, N450m was traced to Danladi.

The money was part of the N23bn "disbursed" by ex-Minister of Petroleum, Diezani Alison-Madueke, through the then Director of Finance of the Goodluck Jonathan Campaign Organisation, Senator Nenadi Usman.

The spokesman for EFCC, Wilson Uwujaren, confirmed that Wada was detained by the commission.

He said, “Yes, he was invited by the EFCC over N500m Diezani money. He is still in our custody.”

The Gombe zonal office also quizzed Danladi in respect of N450m collected by him through Senators Joel Dallami Ikenya and Mark Useni during the build-up to the 2015 presidential election.

Danladi, in his statement on oath, told interrogators that he chaired the eight-man committee that disbursed the money for Taraba State.

The EFCC stated, “He further stated that, he and the other members of the committee shared N36m among themselves while the balance of N414m was distributed to other stakeholders across the 16 local government areas of the state and one Development Area Council.”

Danladi was arrested and detained in Abuja last week and later released on bail to reliable sureties, but asked to report to the EFCC Gombe zonal office for further investigation.

Last week, the commission detained a former governor of Benue State, Gabriel Suswam, for his role in the disbursement of the Diezani sleaze.

At least 20 former ministers and governors may be detained by EFCC in the latest recovery move.

 宝宝喉咙有痰可能是支气管感染引起的,也可能与缺钙引起的喉软骨发育不全有关,给宝宝到医院进行肺部听诊或者查胸片,如果宝宝不咳嗽没事的，对症调理一下。
 指导意见：
 适当给宝宝喝点白开水，有助化痰，宝宝自己不能排痰，只能是慢慢恢复吸收。室内不要太干燥。

posts.title: 2018重庆马拉松开始报名 全程半程仍需摇号_大渝网_腾讯网
posts.text:
2018重庆马拉松报名启动仪式现场 记者 李化 摄
重庆商报-上游财经记者 王淳
重庆商报讯 昨日，2018重庆马拉松报名启动仪式在渝举行。2018重庆马拉松赛事规模为30000人，其中全程马拉松10000人、半程马拉松5500人，迷你马拉松12500人，亲子马拉松2000人。除此之外，2018重庆马拉松设置了300个慈善名额供社会单位、团体及个人报名参与。
主题定为“渝跑越爱”
重庆马拉松已连续成功举办了7届，并被中国田径协会授予中国马拉松金牌赛事、被国际田联授予国际银标赛事，成为中国马拉松大满贯四大成员之一，成为重庆全民健身系列活动中最具特色、最有影响力的品牌赛事和重庆的一张城市名片。
记者在现场了解到，2018重庆马拉松以“渝跑越爱”为主题，将推出2018重马新的VI设计及logo设计，打造具有重庆特色的山城马拉松。主办方透露，2018重马继续推出打造独具重庆特色的美食马拉松（火锅马、小面马、啤酒马）、美景马拉松（旅游马）、美女马拉松为一体的“三美”马拉松。重马体博会、嘉年华、夜跑南滨、重马训练营等活动也会升级创新，着力打造体验型马拉松。此外，主办方还会加强志愿者队伍的建设和培训，提升重马志愿者的服务质量和水平。记者打探到，2018重马不但会为全、半程选手提供完赛T恤和悍将运动功能袜；为迷你马拉松选手新增运动帽和纪念徽章，免费提供机场、高铁站接站服务和赛道免费乘车观光服务；还会与西部航空推出“重马定制”、“重马套餐”，为外来跑者提供报名、机票、酒店、美食、旅游等一站式服务，方便外地跑友参赛。
参赛全程半程仍需摇号
据主办方介绍，2018重庆马拉松将于2018年3月25日（星期日）上午8：00在南滨路、巴滨路鸣枪开跑。共设有全程马拉松、半程马拉松、迷你马拉松3项赛事，以及马拉松嘉年华等相关配套活动。赛事规模为30000人，其中全程马拉松10000人、半程马拉松5500人，迷你马拉松12500人，亲子马拉松2000人。
记者了解到，2018重马全程、半程和迷你马拉松的起终点与去年一致，起点均为重庆南滨公园，终点分别为南滨公园、二塘广场和朝天门大桥下。值得一提的是，2018重马全程、半程报名仍沿用预报名、摇号方式进行。预报名将于2017年11月6日起，跑友可以通过重马官方网站和官方微信公众号进行报名。与往届不同的是，预报名时需全额缴纳报名费用（全程、半程马拉松赛报名费均为200元/人），待2017年11月25日预报名结束后，统一摇号抽签，中签名单将于11月27日公布。未中签者，重马组委会将于30日内将报名费原路退回其支付账户。迷你马拉松将于2017年11月28日开始报名（报名费为100元/人），截止时间为2018年2月28日。同时，迷你马拉松将新增亲子马拉松项目供跑友选择。
新增慈善马拉松环节
主办方还表示，为保证近3年参加过重马且成绩优秀的跑友能够顺利参加全、半程马拉松，重马组委会在2018重马报名系统中继续开设精英组通道，凡达到参赛次数及成绩要求的跑友，预报名成功后可免摇号直接获得参赛资格。
值得一提的是，2018重马还设置了300个慈善名额供社会单位、团体及个人报名参与，报名时间从2017年11月28日至2018年2月20日，报满为止，报名费用为2000元/人，所筹善款将用于公益慈善事业，并定期将相关费用支出进行公示。
正文已结束，您可以按alt+4进行评论

thread.title: Ramai ibu tunggal dibiar dan ditinggalkan sendirian uruskan anak-anak sehingga hak mereka dinafikan
thread.title_full: Ramai ibu tunggal dibiar dan ditinggalkan sendirian uruskan anak-anak sehingga hak mereka dinafikan

posts.author: MurahKeNi (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Ramai ibu tunggal dibiar dan ditinggalkan sendirian uruskan anak-anak sehingga hak mereka dinafikan
posts.text:
Nak saham akhirat yang berterusan?  
Sekadar satu idea. Idea ini pun saya dapat dari satu posting yang pernah saya baca. Jumpa, atau kenal, atau tahu di mana-mana ada ibu Tunggal, ibu Tinggal mahupun ibu Tunggul yang kita maklum mereka ini ada anak-anak tetapi terpaksa struggle menanggung semuanya sendiri. Ada ayah, hilang tak bagi nafkah. Ada suami, tak lebih dari tunggul kayu mati. Ada akad, tapi suami hilang dah berabad. 
Carilah saham akhirat dari anak-anak mereka ini. Bagaimana? 
Cari 10 orang sahabat-sahabat lain yang sama-sama mahu mencari saham akhirat. Tak perlu ramai, makin kecil kumpulan, makin mudah nak diuruskan. Cukup 10 orang, tanya, 'nak tak kita sama-sama penuhkan saham akhirat?'. Kalau jawapannya nak, tak mahal harganya. 
Setiap bulan, setiap seorang sumbang RM50. Jadi kalau 10 orang dah dapat RM500. Setiap bulan, serahkan kepada ibu-ibu tersebut. Satu kumpulan, bagi komitmen pada satu keluarga. Jadi perbanyakkan kumpulan supaya lebih banyak keluarga-keluarga malang ini dapat dibantu. 
Nilai ini, kita takkan tahu besar mana maknanya bagi ketiga-tiga kategori ibu yang tersebut di atas tadi, sangat besar. Di saat mereka perlu galas semua, walau sekecil-kecil bantuan, sangat besar maknanya. 
Buat ini tiap-tiap bulan. InsyaAllah, tak banyak sebenarnya. Sebab disitulah salah satu ikhtiar kita nak beli tiket ke syurga. Ingat, syurga tak murah ye, syurga sangat mahal, terlalu mahal. Jadi kalau kita rasa mampu, jangan berkira. Cut off perbelanjaan untuk dunia, salurkan ke tabung akhirat. 
Kalau rasa RM50 itu besar, boleh kurangkan kepada RM20. Tetapi besarkan kumpulan penderma tabung akhirat. Kalau ada 25 orang yang sanggup melabur RM20 sebulan, pun masih boleh dapat RM500. 
Cuba bayangkan pahala yang Allah bagi pada kita tiap-tiap bulan atas keikhlasan kita itu. Nak-nak lagi kalau yang kita bantu itu anak yatim. Allahu Allah. 
Sebenarnya, tak mudah nak membesarkan anak-anak sendirian. Kalau anak seorang, boleh lagi nak kuat. Hanya seorang saja yang perlu ditumpukan. Cuba bayangkan kalau anak itu ramai, mana nak fokus pada emosi anak, keperluan anak, segala keperluan dan urusan rumahtangga, kehidupan. 
Bagi yang mampu, yang dibantu oleh bekas suami atau keluarga, Alhamdulillah. Tapi berapa ramai sebenarnya yang dinafikan hak mereka? Dibiar dan ditinggalkan sendirian mengurus anak-anak. 
Andailah kita ramai-ramai sanggup menggerakkan bantuan seperti ini, InsyaAllah akan makin banyak jiwa-jiwa yang mampu kita selamatkan. Jiwa ibu-ibu ini dari menderita dengan pelbagai tekanan kehidupan. Supaya mereka boleh mendidik anak-anak mereka dengan lebih baik. 
Saya bukan bercakap perkara ini untuk saya. Tetapi bukalah mata, pandanglah sekeliling kita. Berapa banyak kes-kes wanita yang sangat struggle hanya demi membesarkan anak-anak mereka. Jangan tanya apa yang orang lain buat. Tapi tanyalah diri kita, apa yang kita buat? 
Wallahu'alam. 
Saya, Ummi HaniAqil Mental Disorder Survivor #LawanUntukHidup

thread.title_full: La Fortuna di Montalcino pronta per svinare

posts.author: Barbara Amoroso
posts.title: La Fortuna di Montalcino pronta per svinare
posts.text:
Home > News > La Fortuna di Montalcino pronta per svinare La Fortuna di Montalcino pronta per svinare La folta vegetazione ha protetto le sue uve che si confermano di qualità. 
L’azienda di Montalcino La Fortuna è pronta per svinare: ‘La vendemmia è stata scarsa – racconta Angelo Zannoni – ma la qualità è eccelsa’. Una stagione difficile per molte aziende italiane che ha compromesso quantità e maturazione fenolica. Ma per La Fortuna qualche buona notizia c’è: ‘Noi prediligiamo un lungo contatto con le bucce, specialmente quando queste tengono, e quelle di quest’anno consentono di farlo’. Un 2017 anomalo penalizzante per quasi tutte le aziende, ma Montalcino può contare su un asso nella manica: la fama e il pregio del suo vino conosciuto in tutto il mondo, confermato tra i top con una quota di 1.010 euro a quintale, che lo fa chiudere con un +12,8% rispetto al 2016. E in questo slalom tra incertezze e crescita assoluta, per l’azienda La Fortuna la vendemmia è stata caratterizzata da uve eccellenti, lasciate maturare dopo un’attenta selezione dei grappoli migliori: ‘Siamo fieri della qualità delle nostre uve, soprattutto di quelle intorno all’azienda esposte a nord. Ci siamo difesi dalla bruciatura del sole grazie a una vegetazione intensa. Il risultato finale è buono a fronte di un -30% di raccolto’. La Fortuna, in Montalcino, is ready for the racking The dense canopy sheltered the grapes, which confirm their quality. 
La Fortuna winery , based in Montalcino, is ready for the racking. Angelo Zannoni says: “the harvest was poor in terms of quantities but the quality was excellent”. It was a difficult season for many Italian wineries; quantities and phenolic maturation were compromised. However, there are some good news for La Fortuna : “we prefer to extend the contact with the skins, especially when they last long, and this year this was possible”. 2017 was a penalizing year for most of the wineries but Montalcino can count on its trump card: its wine is well-known and much appreciated worldwide, it is highly ranked with 1.010 euros per 100 kg and a +12,8% compared to last year. In a continuous turnover between uncertainties and absolute growth, the harvest at La Fortuna was characterized by high quality grapes, which have been selected among the best bunches for the aging. “We are proud of the quality of our grapes, especially those in the north side of the estate. We were able to avoid the sunburn thanks to the dense canopy. The final result is good, despite a -30% in the harvest”. Potrebbe piacerti:

posts.title: 不只是健康好零食，热门的维生素在脉宝云店都能找到！
posts.text:
【编者按】 目前，休闲食品成为现代家庭日常消费的必备品，在消费升级、高度多元化的时代，消费者选择知名度更高、产品质量更有保障的品牌。脉宝云店相... 
目前，休闲食品成为现代家庭日常消费的必备品，在消费升级、高度多元化的时代，消费者选择知名度更高、产品质量更有保障的品牌。脉宝云店相关负责人表示： “就零食而言，脉宝云店中的品类已经十分齐全， 脉宝云店 崇尚健康零食的理念，入口的东西，在品牌挑选中都是层层把关的，精挑细选 的。 ” 而且，脉宝云店 为消费者提供健康、优质的零食，满足各类人群的营养需求。比如进口零食，是现在很多家长的选择，脉宝云店的进口零食产品 种类 也相当齐全，每一个产品都保证正品好货， 是 消费者可以放心挑选 的平台！ 脉宝云店：不仅要健康好零食，也要膳食补充剂维生素！ 维生素又名维他命，是维特生命的一种重要元素。 脉宝云店上的健康小贴士表示， 当人体内缺乏一种或几种维生素时，身体的健康状况就会出现问题，科学证明，如果长期缺乏某些为维生素，则会导致各种慢性疾病的发生，所以维生素对与人体是必不可少的。 随着中国人健康意识的提升，维生素补充剂也在刷新中国人的健康习惯 ——每天从随身小药盒里捡出这些五颜六色的小药片吃下去，才觉得做好了应对一天繁忙生活的“能量储备”。有人笃信这句老话：一分钱一分货，对几块钱、十几块钱的维生素片嗤之以鼻，转而追求其他厂家昂贵的维生素片，认为越贵越有效。 脉宝 App的健康小贴士让消费者了解到， 其实并不是这样的，膳食补充剂，有的属于保健品，有的则是药品。对于同一种膳食补充剂，比如维生素 C片，保健品和药品之间没有实质性的差别。 市场上这么多品牌的维生素怎么选 ?来脉宝云店看看吧 在脉宝云店， 汇集 了 最热门 的 维生素，收集的都是销售王牌，给 消费者带来的是 最好的维生素 ，而且购买也都很方便哦！ 对于女性来讲，如果可以根据个人的生活情况补充合适的维生素，会对女人起到维护健康、保养肌肤和延缓衰老的功效。现代女性，越来越多的女人认识到维生素对人体的好处，学会如何补充维生素可以让自己变得更加健康、靓丽。不知道如何选择维生素的消费者，可以随时咨询脉宝云店的相关客服，客服会推荐适合你的一款产品。 脉宝云店， 补充维生素是否有必要 需 因人而定 比如南方人会比北方人吃更多的新鲜蔬菜，因此不同地区人们体内的营养元素水平也有所不同。另外，由于营养物质缺乏而导致疾病的患者，需要膳食补充剂快速补充营养，并辅以平衡膳食。对于那些经常不能正常进食水果、蔬菜、奶制品、鸡、鱼和肉类的人来说，维生素保健品无疑是一种很好的营养补充。 由于不同地域具有不同的饮食习惯，脉宝云店相关专家表示： “保健食品，选对吃对才能保健康。保健食品具有一定的保健功能，适宜特定人群，所以在选购时应因人而宜。 一边挑选一边咨询，脉宝 App的贴心专家会细心的回答消费者疑虑，根据 每个人生活习惯和体质、年龄差异， 推荐适合的维生素，让消费者不仅仅享受到脉宝云店的健康好零食，还能选购到适合自己的维生素哦！

posts.author: Gilson, exemplo de superaĂ§ĂŁo (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: ParticipaĂ§ĂŁo familiar: um caminho para o desenvolvimento da pessoa com deficiĂŞncia
posts.text:
Deve haver equilĂbrio entre a participaĂ§ĂŁo da escola e da famĂlia no desenvolvimento de crianĂ§as deficientes. FOTO: Na Lata   
142 

0 
0 Deve haver equilĂbrio entre a participaĂ§ĂŁo da escola e da famĂlia no desenvolvimento de crianĂ§as com deficiĂŞncia.
FOTO: Na Lata ASSINE A GAZETA DO POVO E TENHA ACESSO ILIMITADO AO CONTEĂšDO EXCLUSIVO DO EDUCAĂ‡ĂƒO E MĂDIA.  CLIQUE AQUI. A escola tem sido cada vez mais responsabilizada pela educaĂ§ĂŁo integral das crianĂ§as, em decorrĂŞncia atĂŠ da prĂłpria rotina das famĂlias, que gera uma distĂ˘ncia entre elas e a atividade dos filhos. No entanto, a efetivaĂ§ĂŁo deste quadro traz impacto bastante negativo no desenvolvimento das crianĂ§as, tanto afetivo quanto pedagĂłgico. Na educaĂ§ĂŁo especial esta realidade ĂŠ ainda mais grave. Muitas vezes, por falta de compreensĂŁo da deficiĂŞncia, as famĂlias nĂŁo se preocupam em acompanhar os progressos dos filhos por julgar que o desenvolvimento deles nĂŁo serĂĄ expressivo. Em outros casos, principalmente logo apĂłs o nascimento do filho deficiente, as famĂlias criam um sentimento de â€œnegaĂ§ĂŁoâ€, que ĂŠ a dificuldade para aceitar o filho como ele ĂŠ. Neste caso, elas perdem uma grande oportunidade de trabalhar a estimulaĂ§ĂŁo em conjunto com a escola, de aproveitar o perĂodo mais fĂŠrtil para o desenvolvimento da crianĂ§a. Ă‰ imprescindĂvel que as famĂlias entendam o real papel delas no desenvolvimento pleno da pessoa com deficiĂŞncia. Apenas os pais ou pessoas mais prĂłximas tĂŞm condiĂ§ĂŁo de acompanhar e celebrar cada conquista que, mesmo pequena, ĂŠ muito importante para o indivĂduo. O apoio e a manifestaĂ§ĂŁo sĂŁo a motivaĂ§ĂŁo para que o deficiente busque seu desenvolvimento e aprimoramento contĂnuo nos aspectos psicomotor, fĂsico, intelectual, social e emocional, que envolvem o processo de aprendizagem. Esta participaĂ§ĂŁo deve ocorrer nas reuniĂľes da escola, no acompanhamento da agenda e das atividades que sĂŁo desempenhadas na instituiĂ§ĂŁo, bem como na busca de orientaĂ§ĂŁo, informaĂ§Ăľes e troca de experiĂŞncia com outras famĂlias. ImprescindĂvel tambĂŠm ĂŠ o afeto familiar, que deve acontecer em todos os momentos da vida, principalmente na infĂ˘ncia. PorĂŠm, ĂŠ importante frisar que ele deve sempre ser manifestado de maneira equilibrada, evitando os extremos da superproteĂ§ĂŁo e da negaĂ§ĂŁo do filho, que podem resultar, por exemplo, em inseguranĂ§a, baixa autoestima, passividade, dificuldade de socializaĂ§ĂŁo e de enfrentar situaĂ§Ăľes de conflito ou dificuldade. Ivete Castro ĂŠ mĂŁe de cinco filhos, sendo que dois deles tĂŞm SĂndrome de Down. Nesta trajetĂłria, Ivete sempre esteve presente na rotina deles, acompanhando de perto as atividades nas escolas onde estudaram.  â€œProcuro participar sempre e me envolver em tudo que diz respeito ao desenvolvimento dos meus filhos porque, vendo o interesse que nĂłs, pais, temos, eles acreditam que nada serĂĄ impossĂvel para eles. A alegria, o afeto e os elogios da famĂlia incentivam o filho a superar os seus limites, sendo perceptĂvel a diferenĂ§a na crianĂ§a quando isso acontece.â€ TambĂŠm ĂŠ muito importante que as escolas especiais encontrem maneiras inteligentes e viĂĄveis de aproximar as famĂlias, despertar nelas a razĂŁo e a importĂ˘ncia da participaĂ§ĂŁo na rotina dos filhos. A Escola Multidisciplinar de Curitiba, que atende crianĂ§as de 0 a 6 anos com deficiĂŞncia mĂşltipla, faz um trabalho diferenciado de apoio e aproximaĂ§ĂŁo Ă s famĂlias, realiza atendimento psicolĂłgico para os pais, tanto na esfera individual quanto em grupos. Nestes encontros, sĂŁo trabalhados diversos temas, alĂŠm de filmes. Em alguns deles, sĂŁo convidados adultos com deficiĂŞncia mĂşltipla, que demonstram como ĂŠ possĂvel seguir com uma vida de qualidade apesar da deficiĂŞncia. A diretora Eliane Reinert afirma que estas prĂĄticas sĂŁo essenciais para o desenvolvimento dos alunos e facilitam a aceitaĂ§ĂŁo das famĂlias. Segundo ela, ĂŠ visĂvel a diferenĂ§a no desenvolvimento dos alunos cujos pais sĂŁo presentes em relaĂ§ĂŁo Ă queles que tĂŞm uma famĂlia ausente. Desta forma, ĂŠ importante que ambas as partes criem espaĂ§o para esta relaĂ§ĂŁo: a escola, abrindo as portas com atividades que cativem e gerem interesse nos pais; e as famĂlias, que devem organizar suas rotinas para participar de todas as atividades possĂveis e incentivar a cada instante o desenvolvimento dos seus filhos.

thread.title: TRENDING: Moving Into The Fast Lane, Riding Atop The Blockchain
thread.title_full: TRENDING: Moving Into The Fast Lane, Riding Atop The Blockchain

posts.author: PYMNTS
posts.title: TRENDING: Moving Into The Fast Lane, Riding Atop The Blockchain
posts.text:
Print Today, companies large and small are investing resources into using blockchain and distributed ledger technologies, in what some may later view as the golden age of blockchain development. Interestingly, many of these investments are made with the aim of moving B2B operations for companies, from auto manufacturers to financial firms, into the fast lane. The November edition of the PYMNTS.com B2B API Tracker™ , a FI.SPAN collaboration, looks at the latest developments in blockchain and distributed ledger technology, along with other news and headlines from around the B2B API space. 
Around the B2B API World Can the blockchain make international currency transfers a bit easier? That’s the goal of a new proof of concept produced by processing solutions provider CGI Group, in collaboration with the Bank of Montreal, the Royal Bank of Canada and Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group. The eventual public debut could be a milestone, as it would mark the first successful integration of a blockchain-based service with a trade finance platform. Similarly, Mastercard wants to get more players involved in blockchain endeavors. The company recently announced that its blockchain API would be available to roughly 22,000 partner financial institutions and merchants for cross-border B2B payments. For the latest notable B2B API trends and headlines, checkout the November tracker’s News and Trends section. 
Building a Faster, Safer Network on the Blockchain And, of course, Mastercard isn’t alone in trying to use blockchain to build bonds between businesses. Companies involved in everything from financial services to auto manufacturing are using the tech to make B2B payments safer, speedier and simpler. In a recent interview with PYMNTS, Brian Behlendorf, executive director of Hyperledger , explained why he believes technologies like blockchain and distributed ledger can make B2B operations run more smoothly for businesses of all kinds. “These can obviously be used prominently in the financial services space,” he said. “But they also can be used in the healthcare industry, and often in supply chain settings as well, so there’s lots of interesting stories and use cases there.” To read the story, download the latest Tracker. 
To download the November edition of the PYMNTS.com B2B API Tracker™, click the button below:

thread.title: Il Merano WineFestival giunge alla 26esima edizione
thread.title_full: Il Merano WineFestival giunge alla 26esima edizione

posts.author: Myriam Zangari
posts.title: Il Merano WineFestival giunge alla 26esima edizione
posts.text:
Home > News > Il Merano WineFestival giunge alla 26esima edizione Il Merano WineFestival giunge alla 26esima edizione Dal 10 al 14 novembre la città altoatesina sarà la capitale delle eccellenze food&wine nazionali e internazionali 
La città di Merano è pronta ad ospitare una delle manifestazioni dedicate al vino conosciute a livello mondiale. Il Merano WineFestival 2017 inaugurerà la sua 26esima edizione il 10 novembre e offrirà ai suoi visitatori cinque giornate piene di emozioni, contenuti e idee da scoprire. Saranno presenti oltre 450 case vitivinicole, tra le migliori in Italia e nel mondo, quasi 200 artigiani del gusto e 15 chef di spicco. Il Merano WineFestival è stato il primo evento organizzato in Europa, che dal 1992 non rappresenta un semplice evento enologico ma una vera e propria occasione di incontro tra produttori, professionisti del settore e consumatori. Un evento internazionale che offre visibilità e notorietà alle aziende selezionate puntando sull’alta qualità dei prodotti presentati in una cornice prestigiosa: l’elegante riserva di caccia del fondatore Helmut Koecher, WineHunter per eccellenza, il primo a denominare un evento WineFestival e a realizzare un percorso sensoriale con un unico calice. La giornata di apertura del Merano WineFestival 2017, il 10 novembre, è dedicata ai vini biologici, biodinamici, naturali e PIWI (varietà resistenti alle malattie fungine). Dall’11 al 13 novembre si potranno scoprire i vini italiani e quelli internazionali provenienti da diversi territori: dalla Spagna all’Argentina, dal Libano al Sud Africa, dall’Austria alla Crimea. Per tutta la durata del festival avrà luogo GourmetArena con l’accurata selezione di prodotti tipici nazionali ed internazionali. Cooking Farm sarà il fulcro della nuovissima Chef Arena dove famosi chef a livello nazionale, master chef, maestri di cucina e contadine altoatesine si confronteranno su ingredienti, lavorazione e realizzazione di piatti della tradizione. In conclusione la giornata di chiusura del WineFestival 2017 sarà dedicata alla “Catwalk Champagne”, la sfilata di ben oltre 250 champagne di 80 aziende francesi tra le più rinomate.

thread.title: Arab Petroleum Investments Corporation sells $500 million 5-year sukuk
thread.title_full: Arab Petroleum Investments Corporation sells $500 million 5-year sukuk - The National

posts.author: Mahmoud Kassem
posts.title: Arab Petroleum Investments Corporation sells $500 million 5-year sukuk
posts.text:
Apicorp said it had previously sold sukuk in 2015 and bonds twice in the Taiwanese Formosa market. Courtesy Apicorp The Arab Petroleum Investments Corporation (Apicorp) sold a US$500 million 5-year sukuk as part of its $3 billion trust certificate programme in a sale that attracted almost seven times the amount available for sale.
The Islamic bonds were sold at 100 basis points over mid-swaps and attracted $3.45bn in subscriptions from over 215 investors.
Middle East and North Africa investors bought 41 per cent of the bonds on sale, while European, Asian and offshore US investors purchased 59 per cent, the company said.
“We are delighted with the heavy over-subscription of this sukuk transaction,” said Ahmed Attiga, the chief executive officer of Apicorp.
“It is clear with over 200 investors across various jurisdictions, we have firmly planted the Apicorp flag in the capital markets allowing us to develop strong relationships with new fixed income investors. The success of this transaction is testament to Apicorp’s impressive 40-year track record, unique ownership structure and strong fundamentals, and reassuring Aa3 credit rating,” Mr Attiga said.

thread.title: Kolumne Gott und die Welt: Der Untergang der toten Omas
thread.title_full: Kolumne Gott und die Welt: Der Untergang der toten Omas - taz.de

posts.author: anamolie
posts.text:
Klar, verschwunden... der Name des Gerichtes. Ich bin mir nicht ganz im Klaren, was der Autor damit sagen will. Eine verhohnepipelte Bezeichnung, die von den Kreatoren wohl so nicht angedacht war, und somit nicht zur Befriedigung kannibalischer Triebe taugte. DDR-ler hatten aus meiner Kenntnis viele lustige Bezeichnungen für Dinge, die von oben herab aus Sparzwängen oder der Ideologie heraus verordnet wurden; Wohl der ironische Umgang mit einer Diktatur. Auf mich wirkt das sehr sympathisch.
Wenn ich heute bspw die marktwirtschaftlichen Zwänge dagegen stelle, die bspw solche verführerische Blüten hervorbringt, wie Bärchen-Gesichtswurst für fleischunlustige Kinder, fehlt mir darin der ironische Umgang mit der Marktideologie.

posts.text:
Heinrich Zille - 

Den ming Mouder als Fürsorgerin im
Roten Wedding wohl noch gekannt hat 
Hat - anders er - die DDR bis 1951 erlebt!
Aber schon er - hat der - hier von 
Micha Brumlik sagen wir mal mit "Gott & der Welt" sezierten - 
Wurst in der ihm eigenen Art ein Denkmal gesetzt - 

Der Butiker - 
"Meine Wurst ist gut - 
Wo keen Fleesch is - da is Blut - 
Wo keen Blut is - da sind Schrippen!
An meine Wurst ist nicht zu tippen!"
& dann heißt es bei wiki - 
"…Rote Grützwurst oder Blutwurst, in Sachsen Tiegelwurst, enthält neben Fleisch frisches Schweineblut. Deren Füllung ist, lose gebraten, wegen ihres Aussehens regional und sarkastisch auch unter den Bezeichnungen „Tote Oma“, „Verkehrsunfall“, kurz „Unfall“, bekannt.…"
have a look at ~> https://de.m.wikiped...wiki/Grützwurst 
&
Dann ist da ja noch "Kalter Hund" https://de.m.wikiped...iki/Kalter_Hund 
"…Die Geschichte dieses „Kuchens ohne Backen“ lässt sich bis ins frühe 20. Jahrhundert zurückverfolgen; die Firma Bahlsen gab in den 1920er Jahren ein Rezept für einen „Schokoladenkuchen aus Leibniz-Keks“ heraus. Heute wird der Kuchen aber vor allem mit der Küche der deutschen Wirtschaftswunderzeit assoziiert.
kurz - der West-fake*!
& 
Dann ist da ja vor allem aber noch "Armer Ritter" - Remember?!
Auch der - fälschlich der 
DDR zugeschrieben - https://munchies.vic...erichte-der-ddr - 
Den mir meine großbürgliche Mutter*04 schon zu SBZ-Zeiten 
Mit lecker Vanille-Soße "gekocht" hat!-;)
& Dazu jetzt abschließend 
Micha Brumlik - ~>
"…Angesichts dessen hilft nichts – nun muss schwerstes theoretisches Geschütz herangeführt werden: Wir werden bei der Analyse dieser Vorliebe einer nachnationalsozialistischen Gesellschaft an der Lust am Kannibalischen nicht vorbeikommen,… "
Nun ich schonn - mühelos!
Weil ich einen solchen Ansatz für einen verstiegenen Schmarrn halte!

thread.title: Trecerea contribuţiilor sociale de la angajator la angajat și salariile românilor
thread.title_full: Trecerea contribuţiilor sociale de la angajator la angajat și salariile românilor

posts.author: Guest
posts.title: Trecerea contribuţiilor sociale de la angajator la angajat și salariile românilor
posts.text:
Trecerea contribuţiilor sociale de la angajator la angajat și salariile românilor Scris de Guest la 7 noiembrie 2017 Nu există comentarii 
Un comentariu 
- la „dialogul” dintre Vasile Ernu și doamna Stoiciu, publicat pe adevărul.ro… - 
Doamna Victoria spune: „ La un salariu minim net de 925 de lei – net înseamnă cât ia omul în mână, angajatul plăteşte la stat încă 325 de lei sub formă de impozit (16%) şi contribuţii sociale (CASS) şi de sănătate (CAS). Aceşti 325 de taxe plus netul de 925 reprezintă salariul brut, cel de pe statul de plată .” 
Doamna Stoiciu are o mică problemă de aritmetică. Tot românul știe că salariul minim brut este de 1450 de lei. În opinia dânsei, 925 de lei (cât ia românul în mână) adunat cu 325 de lei (cât plătește angajatul la stat) dă „exact” 1450! Atâta doar că mai lipsesc 200 de leuți. Pentru amatorii de cifre exacte, iată-le: un salariu minim de 1450 de lei brut presupune un cost din partea angajatorului de 1783 de lei, din care: • angajatul își bagă în buzunar 1065 de lei și statul își trage partea lui, de 385 de lei; • angajatorul mai „pune” în punguța statului încă 333 de lei, tot din munca angajatului. 
Exprimat în procente, asta înseamnă că statul își însușește 40,3% din munca a cca. 2 milioane de români care muncesc pe salariul minim . Procentul crește la cei cu salarii brute mai mari. Alfel spus, împărțeală frățească: tu (românul) muncești, eu (statul) iau și ei (specialii) împart… Asta da „conjugare” a competențelor! 
Nu v-ați prins de fentă? În prima fază (aia de dinaintea alegerilor), „partidul” ăsta social democrat a promis creșterea salariilor și a câștigat scrutinul. În faza-a doua a mărit remunerațiile cățeilor de curte și, în a treia etapă, a constatat că nu are de unde. Și-atunci i-a venit ideea de a trece toate „contribuțiile” în sarcina angajatului. 
Și-uite-așa a dus la bun sfârșit încă o minciună electorală: a mărit statistic salariul minim, da’ românul de rând (amploiații cu ștaif ai statului nu intră în această categorie) tot cu buzunarul gol rămâne. Muncește cinci luni pe an ca să-i susțină pe „reprezentanții aleși” ai acestui „partid” . Io zic că merită să-mi bag ștampila-n tușiera lui. Dacă n-ați priceput ce-am vrut să spun, atunci vă urez „noapte bună”… 
Ce fain ar fi să vă zic „bună dimineața”! Sau, vorba lui Andrei Mureșan, deșteaptă-te (odată) române! Ar fi cazul… 
P.S.: Sper că ați remarcat faptul că n-am pomenit de Dragnea, ci de „partid”…

posts.author: KamiK
posts.title: Видеорегистраторы • Toyota Land Cruiser c мигалкой на ул. Республики скрылся с места ДТП
posts.text: Сообщение salomat » Сегодня, 15:43 А почему ряды справа остановились и пропускали? Думаю, им было предъявлено преимущественное право ТЛК на маневр в виде мигалки и звукового сигнала. Они дружно остановились, а ТС не услышал сигнала и не расчухал, что это справа остановились... Вообще-то если ряды сбоку остановились, то водитель тоже должен остановиться, правда это перед пешеходным переходом. Но ситуация может быть всякая, например кто-то(ребенок) побежал, что-то вынесло на дорогу и т.п., поэтому ТС не проявил сообразительности. Когда на дороге что-то не так, надо насторожиться...Также смущает отсутствие звука на видео, может сирена всё-же была и мигалка тоже? Может ТЛК не почувствовал, что был удар и машинам нанесены повреждения? Кстати, вчера Путин подписал какой-то Указ по охране руководителей субъектов Федерации, может инструкции предписывали водителю не оставаться на месте, а уезжать?Если вопрос решили "полюбовно", значит, не всё еще потеряно у наших властей.

领导一行来到北京立高科技股份有限公司重点检查了该企业燃煤锅炉的封停情况、停水停电措施的落实情况，张志全同志要求，要严格按照“两断三清”的标准对不符合环保要求的工业企业坚决予以清退。杜志勇同志强调，要高度重视空气污染应对工作，各工业企业要严格落实停产限产要求，属地政府和相关职能部门要严格督查、严格追责。同时，要加强舆论宣传，动员全社会积极参与，全面落实好空气重污染应对措施。

posts.author: doris33
posts.text:
Bonjour,
le fait d'être en invalidité ne signifie pas forcément que vous serez prise en charge à 100% pour tous les soins et en cas d'accident, en supposant que vous soyez à 100% pour telle pathologie.
D'où l'intérêt d'avoir une mutuelle pour toutes les fois où vous ne seriez pas prise en charge à 100%.
Une hospitalisation sans intervention chirurgicale représente très rapidement des frais énormes !!

thread.title: Митинг-концерт «Россия объединяет»
thread.title_full: Митинг-концерт «Россия объединяет»

posts.title: Митинг-концерт «Россия объединяет»
posts.text: Next Митинг-концерт «Россия объединяет» 4 ноября коллектив ГБУ ЦДиС «Юность» в полном составе посетил митинг-концерт «Россия объединяет», посвященный Дню народного единства, который прошел на стадионе в «Лужниках».Организатором мероприятия выступила Общественная палата России. Среди приглашенных звездбыли - Филипп Киркоров, группа «Любэ», Григорий Лепс, Полина Гагарина, Наргиз, Нюша, Денис Майданов, Кристина Си, Елена Темникова, Джиган и многие другие.День народного единства отмечается в России с 2005 года. Праздничная дата была установлена в память о событиях 1612 года, когда народное ополчение под предводительством Кузьмы Минина и Дмитрия Пожарского освободило Москву от польских интервентов. Исторически этот праздник связан с окончанием Смутного времени в России в XVII веке.

이런생각만 가지고 있었는데...드디어 현실이 되는 순간이 오는걸까요 ^^!!
중고차를 잘못알고
구입하시면 정말 큰일납니다.. 1~2만원 하는게 아니기
때문에 정말 신중하게 고민하시고 구입 하셔야해요.
조금만 더 신경쓰고 찾아보신다면
좋은차량을 구입하실수 있으세요!!
그렇기 때문에 그 수고스러움을 제가 도와드리려고합니다^^
그게 저의 직업이니까요 ^^
지금 보시는 쌍용 코란도스포츠 렉카중고차 은 >
차량에 필요한 모든 점검들 을
마친 상태이고 마음에 드신다면
당일출고 도 가능한 중고차량입니다.
1인 신조 및 비흡연차량 으로
이 차량을 구매원하시는 분들에게 적극추천 드리는
엄청난 메리트가 있는 차량 입니다.
사진으로보시면 아시겠지만,
절대 흠이라는걸 잡을수가 없어요...ㅠ!!얼른 잡아가셔요 ♡
요즘 허위매물이
너무 많아서 많이들 헷갈리시죠?
제가 판매하는 차량들은
100% 실매물만 판매중이니
안심하시고 상담받고 방문하시면 됩니다!!!
밤이든 새벽이든 언제든지 친절하고 정확한 상담 해드리겠습니다!

posts.text: Grützwurst mit Kartoffelpüree und Sauerkraut. Hin und wieder gab es diese Mahlzeit auch bei "uns" in Westdeutschland. Schmeckte gut! Eine wirklich kannibalische "Kultur" ist die Fleischwurst, hier im Westen immer beliebt. In diese Fleichwurst kommen Reste aller Art. Interssiert kein Schwein. Doch, die werden getötet für diesen Mist. Fresst weniger Fleisch!

Bonjour,
Vous voulez rire ?
vous pensez ne jamais avoir besoin se soins dentaires, de lunettes ?
vous pensez n'avoir aucun risque d'être hospitalisé ?
vous pensez ne jamais avoir besoin de consulter un médecin et ne jamais avoir de prescription de médicaments, de kiné... ?
etc...
Si vous répondez oui à ces 3 questions, vous n'avez effectivement pas besoin de mutuelle.
Bonne journée
